articles.description: Liverpool released a statement responding to the agent of Fiorentina target Bobby Duncan. “We are aware of and disappointed by the unfounded allegations.”
articles.content:
Liverpool released a statement responding to the agent of Fiorentina target Bobby Duncan. “We are aware of and disappointed by the unfounded allegations.”
Agent Saif Rubie accused Liverpool of creating “deep mental health issues with all the stress the club … [+606 chars]

articles.title: Piccini has patellar fracture
articles.description: Valencia have confirmed Italy international Cristiano Piccini will be out for approximately five months with a patellar fracture.  	The full-back suffered a knock to the right knee during training this morning and was taken to hospital by ambulance for tests.…
articles.content:
